title: The Kerala Story
review: A new film that claims to tell the story of Hindu and Christian women who were lured into joining the Islamic State (IS) group has stirred a huge controversy in India.

title: Pathaan
review: 'Pathaan' has all the ingredients of a masala potboiler — slowmo entries, iconic battle of good versus bad and most importantly a sexy-smouldering Shah Rukh Khan, who can fight the good fight on and off the screen.

title: Never Have I ever
review: Never Have I Ever, Mindy Kaling’s beloved coming-of-age series, will take a bow with its fourth and final season.

title: Megan
review: A robotics engineer at a toy company builds a life-like doll that begins to take on a life of its own.

title: The little mermaid
review: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.
